item.title: CVE-2023-48325|2024-08-02T21:23:39.527Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20lead%20page%20%E2%80%93%20optin%20page%20%E2%80%93%20squeeze%20page%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20landing%20pages
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder – Lead Page – Optin Page – Squeeze Page – WordPress Landing Pages.This issue affects Landing Page Builder – Lead Page – Optin Page – Squeeze Page – WordPress Landing Pages: from n/a through 1.5.1.5.
